BallJoint

public BallJoint(java.lang.String name,
                 DynamicPhysicsObject obj1,
                 DynamicPhysicsObject obj2)
Create the joint and allocate the memory. The joint is not put into action until a call to "attach" is made.

Parameters:

getAnchorRelativeToObj1

public com.jme.math.Vector3f getAnchorRelativeToObj1()
Returns the anchor point set relative to object 1 at any given time. Because the objects move, hence the need for two seperate calls to getAnchor as the point becomes relative to the bodies as they move.

Returns:

getAnchorRelativeToObj2

public com.jme.math.Vector3f getAnchorRelativeToObj2()
Returns the anchor point set relative to object 2 at any given time. Because the objects move, hence the need for two seperate calls to getAnchor as the point becomes relative to the bodies as they move.

Returns:
